de.me.pooling
Class SimpleThreadPoolExecutor

java.lang.Object
  java.util.concurrent.AbstractExecutorService
      de.me.pooling.SimpleThreadPoolExecutor
All Implemented Interfaces:
SimpleExecutorService, Executor, ExecutorService
public class SimpleThreadPoolExecutor
extends AbstractExecutorService
implements SimpleExecutorService

SimpleExecutorService implementation using a thread pool.

This executor is trying to execute commands immediately using up to maxPoolSize threads.
If the pool cannot be further extended then the commands are queued up to maxQueuedTasks.
If even the queue is full then the execute methods will block the calling thread.

Note that there is no explicit start method since the executor is started with the first command to execute.
Nevertheless once the executor was shut down, it cannot be used again.

Sets the thread group name, defaults to this class name.
Note that this will create a new thread group with the given name.

Parameters:
name - the new thread group name
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if pool threads exist currently

setThreadName

public void setThreadName(String threadName)
Sets the pool thread base name, defaults to name of class SimpleThreadPoolExecutor.PoolThread.
This name is extended with a dash and number for an actual pool thread.

Parameters:
threadName - the new thread base name

setThreadDaemon

setCorePoolSize

public void setCorePoolSize(int corePoolSize)
Sets the core pool size, defaults to 0.
Once pool threads reach this level, it will be retained (core threads do not time out).

Parameters:
corePoolSize - the new core pool size
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if executor already shut down

setMaxPoolSize

public void setMaxPoolSize(int maxPoolSize)
Sets the maximum pool size, defaults to 10.
Pool threads can time out until the core level is reached.

Parameters:
maxPoolSize - the new max pool size
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if executor already shut down

setThreadTimeout

public void setThreadTimeout(long timeout,
                             TimeUnit unit)
Sets the pool thread timeout, defaults to 60000 ms.
Only if thread level is higher than the core level then idle threads will stop.

Parameters:
timeout - the timeout
unit - the timeout unit
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if executor already shut down

setMaxQueuedTasks

public void setMaxQueuedTasks(int maxQueuedTasks)
Sets the limit of queued commands, defaults to Integer.MAX_VALUE.
This limit does not include executing commands.

Parameters:
maxQueuedTasks - the new limit
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if executor already shut down

setUncaughtExceptionHandler

public void setUncaughtExceptionHandler(Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler uncaughtExceptionHandler)
Sets the uncaught exception handler for pool threads.
By default the errors will be logged in error level.

Parameters:
uncaughtExceptionHandler - the new handler

executeImmediately

public boolean executeImmediately(Runnable command)
                           throws InterruptedException
Executes the given command immediately or adds it to the command queue immediately.

This is the same as execute(0L, TimeUnit.NANOSECONDS, command).

Specified by:
executeImmediately in interface SimpleExecutorService
Parameters:
command - the command to execute
Returns:
true, if task was executed or added to the command queue, false if command queue was full
Throws:
InterruptedException - if calling thread was interrupted
See Also:
SimpleExecutorService.execute(long, TimeUnit, Runnable)

execute

public boolean execute(long timeout,
                       TimeUnit unit,
                       Runnable command)
                throws InterruptedException
Executes the given command immediately or waits the given timeout until it was added to the command queue.

Specified by:
execute in interface SimpleExecutorService
Parameters:
timeout - the timeout to wait for enqueuing the command, negative value to block until it is enqueued
unit - the timeout unit
command - the command to execute
Returns:
true, if task was executed or added to the command queue, false if timeout occurred before
Throws:
InterruptedException - if calling thread was interrupted
